Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Peri's Mom
Reviews.Content: I researched camera's before deciding on this one.  It is exactly what I hoped it would be.  Works great.  Nice sharp picture from about 20 feet or so.  Very user friendly.  Not too heavy either.  Showed it to my son-in-law and he wants one now.

Reviews.Title: I like this camera
Reviews.Author: rudbecki
Reviews.Content: The camera has nice balance when held. it is easy to use. It has a very powerful zoom (24x) for  this size camera. I am still learning how to use its features. I still like a small point and shoot for skiing and hiking when a small compact camera is valued but this camera is a nice size for carrying around in a camera bag. I like the shape of the body because it is comfortable when holding it to shoot a picture. I haven't used it enough to decide how i like the shutter speed or the different settings.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1MP High Sensitivity MOS Sensor
Leica DC Vario-Elmarit 24x Zoom Lens
25-600mm Optical Zoom Lens (Equivalent)
3.0" 460,000-dot Intelligent LCD Display
Full Manual Override
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix FZ60 Digital Camera w/ Point & Shoot Advanced Package
